Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This unique item has been meticulously crafted with high-quality materials and cutting-edge technology, making it an exceptional choice for those seeking unparalleled performance and style. We believe its value exceeds $12000, but I'm offering it to you at a special introductory price of $15000. This exclusive opportunity won't last long, so please let me know if you're interested in securing this masterpiece for your collection. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
